content: Hello! I'm <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>.

content: Much obliged! {A心虚目移}I was just concerned it HMM! Might've come off a bit weird, y'know.

content: I just finished this hat on the road, with a bit of the good fortune from our meeting today.

content: No problem, I know where to find it.

content: New Rain Sun Hat... Where can I find it?

content: I'm off to collect more hat-making materials. But before I go, here's my contact info...

content: {A想象}If I could moo — measure and sketch out your head, and tailor a hat that fits you perfectly, then place it on you... that'd be ASTONISHING!

content: I might've been too loud again... I'm HMM! Really sorry, for startling you.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1011多杰朗_多杰朗

content: Would you mind trying on a <style=Highlight>New Rain Sun Hat</style>? I made that hat myself, and it should help me get a rough idea of your head.

content: Please allow me to introduce myself. {A吉祥如意}My name is <style=NpcName>Dorjelang</style>. It's my pleasure to meet you, tashi delek.
info: NPC初次偶遇模版图-1011多杰朗_多杰朗

content: I'm off to collect more hat-making materials. But before I go, here's my contact info...

content: If you ever want to reach me, just give me a call through Starcove. {A打招呼}I'll be looking forward to our next meeting!

content: {A困惑晕眩}Why is there a perfect head spinning around...? So dizzy... Mmmooo?

content: {A心虚目移}I don't quite remoomber what just happened. Maybe I knocked down a tree or two... But I'll take full responsibility! I'm HMM! Just glad you're okay.

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, your name is just as special as you. {A看我的}I'd like to give you a hat that I made myself, as thanks for waking me up when I passed out.
